audioText: La soupe mangée était trop pâle à cause du manque de médicaments colorants.
question: Why was the consumed soup too pale?
options: Because of the lack of coloring medications
Because it was prepared without proper seasoning
Because the vegetables were not fresh enough
Because the cooking time was insufficient
explanation: The correct answer is 'Because of the lack of coloring medications'. The text states 'La soupe mangée était trop pâle à cause du manque de médicaments colorants' - The consumed soup was too pale because of the lack of coloring medications. 'Mangée' is the feminine past participle of 'manger' (to eat), and 'pâle' means 'pale'.
